org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic

Class PedersenCommitment<G>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic.PedersenCommitment<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the group element type. This type is used as the commitment type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher.PK<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, Homomorphic<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECPedersen, TrapdoorPedersenCommitment, ZpPedersen

    public class PedersenCommitment<G>
extends java.lang.Object
implements NonInteractiveCommitment.Committer<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, Cipher.PK<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>, Homomorphic<G,java.math.BigInteger,java.math.BigInteger>
    An implementation of Pedersen Commitment over a generic group. Pedersen commitment is Homomorphic and perfectly hiding. It is binding as long as the discrete-log problem in the underlying group is hard.

    • Field Detail

      • grp

        protected CyclicGroup<G> grp

      • g

        protected transient G g
        First Generator for the group G.

      • h

        protected G h
        Second Generator for the group G. Breaking binding property is equivalent to computing discrete log of g in base h.
